movies.title: Vash Level 2
movies.description: Ten years after saving his daughter Arya from a dark force, Atharva learns it never left her. When strange events begin again, he must fight to save her once more.

movies.title: Bhagwat Chapter One: Raakshas
movies.description: Inspector Bhagwat gets transferred to a small town in UP, where he takes up the case of a missing girl. Meanwhile, Sameer is in love with Meera and plans to elope. How do their lives intersect?

movies.title: Baaghi 4
movies.description:
Get ready for the most anticipated Indian movies of the second half of 2025! Major films are set to release, including Aankhon Ki Gustaakhiyan, War 2, Coolie, Son of Sardaar 2, and more. Here's a list of the top picks that everyone is eagerly awaiting!


Among the Indian movies with planned releases for the rest of the year, these titles were consistently the most popular with IMDb customers between January 1, 2025 and July 1, 2025, as determined by the actual page views of the more than 250 million monthly visitors to IMDb worldwide.

movies.title: Santosh
movies.description: Newly widowed Santosh inherits her husband's job as a police constable in the rural badlands of Northern India. When a girl's body is found, she's pulled into the investigation under the wing of charismatic feminist inspector Sharma.

movies.title: Param Sundari
movies.description: In Kerala's picturesque backwaters, a North Indian and South Indian find unexpected love. Their cultural differences spark a hilarious and chaotic romance, full of twists and turns. Two diverse worlds collide in a heartwarming story.

movies.title: Saiyaara
movies.description: Vaani and Krish will have to navigate life, their problems, their insecurities to hopefully realise that only love can be the answer to everything.

movies.title: Son of Sardaar 2
movies.description: After years away, Jassi travels to Scotland to reconcile with his wife, but gets entangled in a mob conflict and a chaotic Sikh wedding. Now he must save hostages and his marriage while navigating cultural chaos.

movies.title: Dhadak 2
movies.description: A searing romantic drama about identity, power, and the cost of love in the world we live in.

movies.title: Qaid - No Wayyy Out
movies.description: Jigar moves to London to live his life on his terms but destiny leads him into a trap with no way out.

movies.title: Mahavatar Narsimha
movies.description: The demon Hiranyakashyap seeks revenge on Vishnu and declares himself a god. His son Prahlad remains devoted to Vishnu. Vishnu manifests as Narsimha to defeat the demon and restore balance.

movies.title: Kesari Chapter 2: The Untold Story of Jallianwala Bagh
movies.description: A dramatization of the life story of C. Sankaran Nair, the lawyer who fought for the truth behind the Jallianwala Bagh massacre.

movies.title: Chhorii 2
movies.description: Sakshi must rescue her seven-year-old daughter from a superstitious cult while fighting societal malpractices and the horror that continues to haunt her and young women around her.

movies.title: Kill
movies.description: During a train trip to New Delhi, a pair of commandos face an army of invading bandits.

movies.title: Malang
movies.description: Advait visits Goa where he meets Sara, a free-spirited girl who lives life unshackled. Opposites attract and all goes well until life turns upside down. Years later, Advait is on a killing spree with cops Aghase and Michael in his...

movies.title: Nadaaniyan
movies.description: A privileged Delhi socialite hires a middle-class student to pose as her boyfriend to maintain her social status. Their pretense becomes complicated when genuine feelings develop between them.

movies.title: Sky Force
movies.description: A gripping tale inspired by true events from one of the deadliest air strikes between India and Pakistan. A hero lost, a comrade's quest for truth-an epic tribute to bravery, sacrifice, and unbreakable courage.

movies.title: Fateh
movies.description: Follows a former gangster who is hired to guard a young woman named Jacqueline. In order to keep her safe, Fateh must employ all of his abilities while simultaneously attempting to learn the truth about the threats made against her.

movies.title: The Storyteller
movies.description: Based on Satyajit Ray's short story "Golpo Boliye Tarini Khuro" about originality versus plagiarism.

movies.title: Baby John
movies.description: Revolves around a DCP who transforms and travels to a different place in order to safeguard his family.

movies.title: The Sabarmati Report
movies.description: Showcases the events of the morning of February 27, 2002, aboard the Sabarmati Express near the Godhra railway station in Gujarat

movies.title: Vanvaas
movies.description: Delves into the dynamics between an elderly father grappling with dementia and his family,

movies.title: Bhool Bhulaiyaa 3
movies.description: Ruhaan, a fraudster posing as an exorcist, takes on a lucrative case at a haunted castle, unraveling a sinister plot involving mischievous priests, culminating in a hilarious yet thrilling ride filled with unexpected twists and sc...

movies.title: Singham Again
movies.description: A new chase is coming - with reference to the epic Ramayana, Singham and his team face an ambiguous villain in order to save his wife.

movies.title: Yo Yo Honey Singh: Famous
movies.description: Dive deep into Yo Yo Honey Singh's sudden disappearance at the peak of his career.

movies.title: The Diplomat
movies.description: An Indian diplomat who tries to repatriate an Indian girl from Pakistan, where she was presumably forced and deceived into marrying against her will.

movies.title: Vicky Vidya Ka Woh Wala Video
movies.description: A newly married couple's relationship and reputation are put at risk when their private video CD is stolen. The story follows their roller coaster journey to recover the CD, navigating a series of unexpected difficulties along the...

movies.title: Jigra
movies.description: When Ankur is wrongfully imprisoned and sentenced to death in a foreign country, his steely sister Satya is driven by a lethal resolve to break him free.

movies.title: Despatch
movies.description: News going digital, veteran crime journalist Joy fights irrelevance. Seeking major scoop and personal redemption, he pursues a perilous investigation into Mumbai's underbelly, unearthing dark secrets.

movies.title: Agni
movies.description: In a city plagued by a strange rise in fires, fireman Vithal and his policeman brother-in-law Samit reluctantly team up to solve the escalating crisis. Battling personal conflicts, they race against time to crack the case and save...

movies.title: Sikandar Ka Muqaddar
movies.description: After an unsolved diamond heist, a hard-nosed cop's pursuit of his key suspect turns into obsession, until they finally face each other and the truth.

movies.title: Girls Will Be Girls
movies.description: At a strict boarding school nestled in the Himalayan foothills, 18 year old Mira first discovers desire and romance. However, her curious, rebellious, coming-of-age is disrupted by her young mother, who never got to come of age he...

movies.title: Munjya
movies.description: A young man's visit to his native village unveils a family secret and a vengeful spirit, the Munjya, who wants to get married. Now the young man must fight to protect himself and his love from Munjya's clutches.

movies.title: Kalki 2898 AD
movies.description: The future of those in the dystopian city of Kasi is altered when the destined arrival of Lord Vishnu's final avatar launches a war against darkness.

movies.title: Chandu Champion
movies.description: A man who faced one adversary after another with an undying spirit. His unwavering zeal and never give up attitude led to India's first individual gold medal in any form of the Olympics.

movies.title: Mr. & Mrs. Mahi
movies.description: A married couple who share a love for cricket begin training in the game due to her natural talent.

movies.title: 200: Halla Ho
movies.description: Loosely based on a real incident, 200: Halla Ho is the story of women, terrorised by a mobster whose gang raped, robbed, terrorised and murdered 300 families for 15 years until he met his nemesis in a young Dalit girl.

movies.title: Savi
movies.description: Savi a simple housewife attempts a daring jailbreak to get her husband out of one of England's high security prisons With 400 inmates, 75 armed guards, 60 surveillance cameras.

movies.title: Bhaiyya Ji
movies.description: A man who stands up for his family and seeks revenge for the wrongs done towards his loved ones.

movies.title: Wild Wild Punjab
movies.description: Khanna has had a breakup. He's upset, but he has friends like Arora, Jain and Honey paa'ji who encourage him to face this breakup head-on and move on. They embark on a trip across Punjab to help Khanna find the closure he desires.

movies.title: Vikram Vedha
movies.description: A tough police officer sets out to track down and kill an equally tough gangster.

movies.title: Teri Baaton Mein Aisa Uljha Jiya
movies.description: Aryan is not able to find a perfect life partner. He meets a perfect girl, Sifra, during an official assignment in the US and falls in love with her only to discover later that it's an impossible love story.

movies.title: Merry Christmas
movies.description: Two strangers meet on a fateful Christmas Eve. A night of delirious romance turns into a nightmare. Revealing anything more would be a crime.

movies.title: Dunki
movies.description: When his friends in Punjab struggle to clear the immigration process, an ex-soldier guides them on a risky journey to enter the UK without permission.

movies.title: Gadar 2
movies.description: When Tara Singh goes missing during a skirmish and is believed to be captured in Pakistan, his son Jeetey sets out to rescue him and enters a labyrinth from which they both must escape at all costs.

movies.title: Sam Bahadur
movies.description: Revolves around the high and low points of Sam Manekshaw who became the first Indian Army officer to be promoted to the rank of Field Marshal.

movies.title: Salaar
movies.description: The fate of a violently contested kingdom hangs on the fraught bond between two friends-turned-foes in this saga of power, bloodshed and betrayal.

movies.title: Animal
movies.description: The hardened son of a powerful industrialist returns home after years abroad and vows to take bloody revenge on those threatening his father's life.

movies.title: One Friday Night
movies.description: Revolves around one stormy night, in an isolated villa a top a secluded hill.

movies.title: Bawaal
movies.description: A small-town man who falls in love with the most beautiful girl in town. He wants to marry her one day because marrying her can raise his social position.

movies.title: Trial Period
movies.description: A working single mother's world turns upside down when her inquisitive son demands a new papa on a 30-day 'Trial Period'.

movies.title: Janaki Jaane
movies.description: Struggling with panic disorder, Janaki is ecstatic when Unni Mukundan proposes to marry her. Things go south when Janaki's fears land her in serious trouble.

movies.title: Lust Stories
movies.director: Zoya Akhtar, Dibakar Banerjee, Karan Johar
movies.description: Four short films by four of India's biggest directors exploring love, sex and relationships in modern India.

movies.title: Lust Stories 2
movies.director: R Balki, Sujoy Ghosh, Amit Ravindernath Sharma
movies.description: Four eminent Indian directors explore sex, desire and love through short films in this sequel to 2018's Emmy-nominated "Lust Stories".

movies.title: Bhediya
movies.description: Set in the forests of Arunachal, Bhediya is a story of Bhaskar, a man who gets bitten by a wolf, and begins to transform into the creature. As Bhaskar and his buddies try to find answers, a bunch of twists, turns, and laughs ensue.

movies.title: Tu Jhoothi Main Makkaar
movies.description: Madness ensues when a 'player' in the world of romantic relationships finds a girl who's a worthy opponent, that believes love is a battle of wits.

movies.title: Kacchey Limbu
movies.description: A wilful young girl who is in the race of fulfilling dreams imposed on her by everyone and being at the receiving end each time.

movies.title: Selfiee
movies.description: Bollywood superstar Vijay Kumar needs to obtain a new driving license from RTO officer Om Prakash Agarwal, a diehard fan of Vijay. A misunderstanding escalates into a feud which is played out in front of the entire country.

movies.title: Chor Nikal Ke Bhaga
movies.description: A flight attendant and her business partner on a mission to steal diamonds and free themselves from the clutches of a loan shark.At 40,000 feet in the air, the heist goes horribly wrong and turns into a hostage situation.

movies.title: Shehzada
movies.description: Bantu is hated by his father Valmiki since he was a toddler. Samara, his boss, shows him affection and love until he discovers that the Jindals are his parents. Bantu decides to seek Jindals love and protect them from threats they...

movies.title: The Lunchbox
movies.description: A mistaken delivery in Mumbai's famously efficient lunchbox delivery system connects a young housewife to an older man in the dusk of his life as they build a fantasy world together through notes in the lunchbox.

movies.title: Mrs Undercover
movies.description: A simple Indian housewife who is in fact a special undercover agent is called back on the job after 10 years of being undercover to take down a terrifying, psycho killer while maintaining her parallel life of a housewife.

movies.title: OMG 2
movies.description: An unhappy civilian asks the court to mandate comprehensive education in schools in a dramatic yet amusing courtroom play.

movies.title: Neeyat
movies.description: When a mysterious murder takes place at exiled billionaire Ashish Kapoor's birthday getaway, detective Mira Rao must use all her skill to unravel devious motives as the suspects are Kapoor's close family and friends.

movies.title: Rocky Aur Rani Kii Prem Kahaani
movies.description: Flamboyant Punjabi Rocky and intellectual Bengali journalist Rani fall in love despite their differences. After facing family opposition, they decide to live with each other's families for three months before getting married.

movies.title: The Kerala Story
movies.description: A converted Muslim woman Fatima Ba narrates her ordeal of how she once wanted to become a nurse but was abducted from her home and manipulated by religious vanguards, turned into an ISIS terrorist and landed in Afghanistan jail.

movies.title: Kho Gaye Hum Kahan
movies.description: Ahana, Neil and Imaad are three friends in their 20s trying to find meaning in the digital age. They lean on each other as they navigate complexities of relationships and self-discovery.

movies.title: Jab We Met
movies.description: A depressed wealthy businessman finds his life changing after he meets a spunky and care-free young woman.

movies.title: Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani
movies.description: Kabir and Naina bond during a trekking trip. Before Naina can express herself, Kabir leaves India to pursue his career. They meet again years later, but he still cherishes his dreams more than bonds.

movies.title: De Dana Dan
movies.description: Two down on their luck men tries to kidnap a wealthy businesswoman's dog to demand a hefty ransom from her. Things goes haywire when the dog goes missing.

movies.title: O Saathiya
movies.description: The evolving love story of Arjun and Keerthi and the trials and tribulations they face as they mature from adolescence to adulthood.

movies.title: Race
movies.director: Abbas Alibhai Burmawalla, Mastan Alibhai Burmawalla
movies.description: Destiny makes two brothers- Ranvir and Rajiv - enemies of each other. Everything is fair in love and war.

movies.title: Race 2
movies.director: Abbas Alibhai Burmawalla, Mastan Alibhai Burmawalla
movies.description: Ranvir treads through the world of the Indian mafia in Turkey as he looks to avenge the death of his lover and partner in crime.

movies.title: Race 3
movies.description: Relationships and loyalties of a criminal family planning its next big heist are tested when some shocking revelations strike them.

movies.title: Why Cheat India
movies.description: The movie focuses on existing malpractices in country's education system, the whole concept of buying your way through education, jobs and earnings. Even with an evolving education system, the country faces scams like SSC and HSC ...

movies.title: Kabali
movies.description: A reformed gangster is released from prison and attempts to protect his family from his enemies.

movies.title: Murder at Teesri Manzil 302
movies.description: A wealthy businessman's wife mysteriously disappears, and a team of investigating officers embark on a search for her. Will they be able to decipher what's going on?

movies.title: Padmaavat
movies.description: Set in medieval Rajasthan, Queen Padmavati is married to a noble king and they live in a prosperous fortress with their subjects until an ambitious Sultan hears of Padmavati's beauty and forms an obsessive love for the Queen of Me...

movies.title: The Girl on the Train
movies.description: The story follows a recent divorcee who spends her daily commute fantasizing about a seemingly perfect couple who live in a house that her train passes daily, but something shocking happens there one day.

movies.title: Sanam Re
movies.description: A man focused on his career finds solace when he reunites with his childhood sweetheart.

movies.title: Raanjhanaa
movies.description: Kundan, the son of a Hindu pundit, discovers that his childhood sweetheart Zoya loves city-bred Akram and wants to marry him. However, he persistently seeks to win her heart.

movies.title: Brothers
movies.description: The story of two brothers, Tom and Jake, and their problematic relationship.

movies.title: Ra.One
movies.description: When the titular antagonist of an action game takes on physical form, it's only the game's less powerful protagonist who can save his creator's family.

movies.title: Phata Poster Nikhla Hero
movies.description: Vishwas Rao is raised by his mother who wants him to become a police officer while he wants to become an actor.

movies.title: Bhagam Bhag
movies.description: The members of a drama troupe fall in trouble when they are framed for a murder. Things go worse when they find their actress committing suicide, which is somehow linked with the murder.

movies.title: Tamasha
movies.description: A boy meets a girl, in Corsica. They decide not to reveal their real name or personality.

movies.title: Goliyon Ki Raasleela Ram Leela
movies.description: Modern adaptation of William Shakespeare's 'Romeo and Juliet' with an Indian twist, the film focuses on the story of Ram and Leela, their love, lust and the drama afterwards.

movies.title: Kaabil
movies.description: A blind dubbing artist seeks revenge against a corrupt politician and his brother, after his wife is raped and killed.

movies.title: Golmaal: Fun Unlimited
movies.description: Four runaway crooks take shelter in a bungalow which is owned by a blind couple.

movies.title: Golmaal Returns
movies.description: A man is sandwiched between his over possessive wife and a police inspector, where he is suspected for adultery and murder.

movies.title: Golmaal 3
movies.description: In Goa, Pritam meets his love Geeta after many years. They decide to get married but the feud between their respective children creates tension in their marriage.

movies.title: Golmaal Again
movies.description: The gang encounters with some spiritual bodies and finds out the truth about the Jamnadas Orphanage where they were brought up.

movies.title: Raaz
movies.description: Sanjana and Aditya decide to give their marriage one last chance. They plan a holiday in Ooty, but they don't know that a strange figure is waiting for them to come.

movies.title: Raaz: The Mystery Continues
movies.description: An artist comes to realize that the woman he has been been painting is real and is being haunted by a ghost.

movies.title: Raaz 3 The Third Dimension
movies.description: When an ingnue's sudden popularity threatens to shove her out of the spotlight, a movie star uses black magic in an attempt to derail her career.

movies.title: Raaz Reboot
movies.description: The fourth installment of a horror series that explores secrets, mysteries and human frailties.

movies.title: Ankur Arora Murder Case
movies.description: A highly reputed doctor makes a small mistake, which costs the life of a kid Ankur Arora. Will he succeed in hiding his mistake or will the mother of the kid get Justice.

movies.title: Bade Miyan Chote Miyan
movies.description: Two elite soldiers with troubled pasts are enlisted for a daring mission when a deadly masked villain threatens India's defenses.

movies.title: Do Aur Do Pyaar
movies.description: A couple on the brink of a breakup are cheating on each other with two sexy outsiders. Whilst they're waiting to reveal their secret and go their separate ways, life has other plans for them.

movies.title: LSD 2: Love, Sex Aur Dhokha 2
movies.description: Complexities of modern relationships and self-discovery in the high-tech age are explored through interconnected stories of love, friendship, and identity.

movies.title: Ghost
movies.description: A Group of some people hijacked the jail in the city and demanding the release of ghost or elsewhere all the criminals will be set free.

movies.title: Ra.One
movies.description: A video game company inadvertently creates and lets loose into the real world a single minded villain obsessed with defeating his archnemesis, a young child, in this fast paced sci-fi action thriller.

movies.title: Haunted - 3D
movies.description: A realtor finds himself accompanied by two ghostly entities inside a mansion. He learns of a violent event that took place years ago and is sent back in time to prevent it from happening.

movies.title: Malaal
movies.description: Malaal is the story of Shiva and Astha, two very different people from contrasting backgrounds who experience the innocence of love. Does their love find its destination or do they part ways? Stay on this journey to find out.

movies.title: Rautu Ka Raaz
movies.description: After the mysterious death of a warden of Sevadham school, it is up to inspector Negi who suffers from PTSD to solve the high-profile investigation which leads him to disturbing facts.

movies.title: Raid
movies.description: A fearless income tax officer raids the mansion of the most powerful man in Lucknow after someone mysteriously draws his attention towards the evidence.

movies.title: Son of Sardaar
movies.description: Realizing he is the target of a vengeful family that welcomed him without knowing his identity, a young man must avoid exiting their house since they won't kill a guest unless he's outside.

movies.title: Rockstar
movies.description: Janardhan Jakhar chases his dreams of becoming a big Rock star, during which he falls in love with Heer.

movies.title: Karthik Calling Karthik
movies.description: A much abused loner achieves success, and even wins the heart of his gorgeous co-worker, after getting early morning mysterious phone calls from someone.

movies.title: The Reluctant Fundamentalist
movies.description: A young Pakistani man chasing corporate success on Wall Street finds himself embroiled in a conflict between his American Dream, a hostage crisis, and the enduring call of his family's homeland.

movies.title: Gangs of Wasseypur Part-1
movies.description: A clash between Sultan and Shahid Khan leads to the expulsion of Khan from Wasseypur, and ignites a deadly blood feud spanning three generations.

movies.description: A clash between Sultan and Shahid Khan leads to the expulsion of Khan from Wasseypur, and ignites a deadly blood feud spanning three generations.

movies.title: Laila Majnu
movies.description: Taking the leap out of the classic folklore, the story is set in today's time in Kashmir where Laila Majnu have problems relevant to the youth of today. While dealing with their feuding families a passionate love story unravels.

movies.title: Highway
movies.description: Right before her wedding, a young woman finds herself abducted and held for ransom. As the initial days pass, she begins to develop a strange bond with her kidnapper.

movies.title: Masaan
movies.description: Along India's Ganges River, four people face prejudice, a strict moral code and a punishing caste system as they confront personal tragedies.

movies.title: Gulaab Gang
movies.description: A fearless woman fights social injustice; creating a sanctuary for abused women and battling a crooked politician.

movies.title: Junooniyat
movies.description: Captain Jahan Bakshi rescues a Punjabi girl, Suhani. This starts a friendship that evolves into a passionate love affair.

movies.title: Srikanth
movies.description: Blind Srikanth gets into MIT, founds Bollant Industries. Pursues goals for visually impaired while facing entrepreneurial challenges, navigating personal sacrifices. Highlights obstacles overcome by the blind in academics and busi...

movies.title: Sanam Teri Kasam
movies.description: After being disowned by her family, an awkward librarian relies on the help of her brooding neighbour.

movies.title: October
movies.description: A group of interns are going through the usual grind when suddenly an accident changes their lives. The protagonist can't get let go of it and becomes obsessed with it. What does it all lead to? Is it love or something else?

movies.title: Badlapur
movies.description: Raghu begins walking a fine line between good and evil as he exacts violent revenge on two criminals who killed his family 15 years ago.

movies.title: Stree
movies.description: In the small town of Chanderi, the menfolk live in fear of an evil spirit named "Stree" who abducts men in the night. Based on the urban legend of "Nale Ba" that went viral in Karnataka in the 1990s.

movies.title: Bajirao Mastani

movies.description: Police officers recount a tale of missing money which results in lies, deceit, betrayal and death.

movies.description: This is a dramatic chain of events in the most glamorous ,swinging era of Hindi films... the 1960s. It was a decade when film stars tasted success and carried their larger than life screen image on to real life with unbridled pomp...

movies.title: OMG: Oh My God!
movies.description: A shopkeeper takes God to court when his shop is destroyed by an earthquake.

movies.title: Sita Ramam

movies.title: Jajantaram Mamantaram
movies.description: A young man lands in the land of little people, who ask him to save them from their enemies.

movies.title: Happy New Year

movies.title: Hate Story
movies.description: After a powerful businessman has her baby forcefully aborted, Kaavya Krishna uses her body as a sexual weapon to destroy his empire, brick by brick.

movies.description: A woman takes revenge on a powerful corrupt politician who forcefully abused her and left her for dead.

movies.title: Hate Story 3

movies.description: A short-term memory loss patient goes on a killing spree in order to avenge the death of his ladylove.

movies.description: A man travelling to Rameswaram via Chennai express for his late grandfather's ashes immersion finds himself in trouble after helping a don's daughter and her cousins board the train.

movies.title: Total Siyapaa
movies.description: A young musician hopes to marry his beautiful Indian girlfriend, but his plans hit a snag when her family learns he's Pakistani.

movies.title: Aladin

movies.description: Bheem and his gang travel to the past to king Damyaan and stop him from being immortal.

movies.title: Bhool Bhulaiyaa 2
movies.description: When strangers Reet and Ruhan cross paths, their journey leads to an abandoned mansion and a dreaded spirit that has been trapped for 18 years.

movies.title: Bhool Bhulaiyaa
movies.description: An NRI and his wife decide to stay in his ancestral home, paying no heed to the warnings about ghosts. Soon, inexplicable occurrences cause him to call a psychiatrist to help solve the mystery.

movies.description: The movie is a romantic comedy that displays the ups and downs in Sumit and Karol's relationship.

movies.description: Two best friends being convinced that they are not in love search for each other's love.

movies.description: Prem and his oversized wife Sandhya are supposed to spend a lifetime together. Will a regular arranged marriage turn out to be a perfect mismatch?

movies.title: F.A.L.T.U

movies.title: Jism
movies.description: When an unemployed man falls for a wealthy woman and he is willing to do whatever he must to get her away from her abusive husband.

movies.title: Haider
movies.description: A young man returns to Kashmir after his father's disappearance to confront his uncle, whom he suspects of playing a role in his father's fate.

movies.title: Singham
movies.description: A truly honest police officer is transferred to a town controlled by a gangster he has humiliated. The gangster believes he can use good power to bring down this officer who made him look foolish and weak.

movies.title: Singham Returns
movies.description: Owing to the wrongdoings affiliated with evils similar to black money, an honest but ferocious police officer returns as the Deputy Commissioner of Police with the prospect of wiping out injustice.

movies.title: Zid
movies.description: A journalist, who is still in love with his ex-girlfriend, becomes the obsession of his landlord's daughter.

movies.title: Ek Paheli Leela
movies.description: Two lovers, having been denied true love 300 years ago, are reincarnated in order to correct that wrong.

movies.title: Dhol
movies.description: Four lazy friends try to woo a rich girl, in order to live a wealthy lifestyle. Their plan, however goes horribly wrong after they get embroiled with a notorious criminal.

movies.title: Anjaana Anjaani
movies.description: After numerous attempts at suicide fail, a couple decides to live it up, then kill themselves on New Year's Day.

movies.title: Vicky Donor
movies.description: A man is brought in by an infertility doctor to supply him with his sperm, where he becomes the biggest sperm donor for his clinic.

movies.title: Dhamaal
movies.description: Four lazy slacker conmen buddies learn about the secret of a hidden treasure from a dying thief and set out to find and claim it while being pursued by a determined police inspector who is hellbent to get the treasure all by himself.

movies.title: Kalyug
movies.description: A newly married couple is caught on camera during their honeymoon. When the wife commits suicide after the video is released on internet, the husband sets out to seek revenge.

movies.title: Batti Gul Meter Chalu
movies.description: The life of three friends takes a tragic turn due to an inflated electricity bill, which leads to a courtroom drama and social awakening.

movies.title: Love Me If You Dare
movies.description: A man's romance with an enigmatic woman leads him down a dark path as he faces terrifying events, vanishings, and heartbreak while urgently trying to uncover her true nature in this eerie Telugu fantasy romance.

movies.title: Ek Villain
movies.description: When his wife becomes the latest victim of a serial killer, Guru blurs the line between good and evil in his pursuit of revenge.

movies.title: Ek Villain Returns
movies.description: The story of two men in one sided love. The paths they choose to fulfill their love stories decide who the Hero is and who is the Villain.

movies.title: Veer-Zaara
movies.description: An Indian Air Force pilot rescues a Pakistani girl stranded in India. Years later, a lawyer seeks to unravel the truth behind the pilot's mysterious imprisonment in Pakistan for over two decades, during which he remained silent.

movies.title: Phir Aayi Hasseen Dillruba
movies.description: While evading the cops in Agra, Rani and Rishu scheme to run away together. But when their plans go awry, Rani asks a mild-mannered admirer for help.

movies.title: Haseen Dillruba
movies.description: Under investigation as a suspect in her husband's murder, a wife reveals details of their thorny marriage that seem to only further blur the truth.

movies.title: Dil Bechara
movies.description: The emotional journey of two hopelessly-in-love youngsters; a young girl, Kizie, who is suffering from cancer; and Manny, a boy Kizie meets at a support group.

movies.title: Saawariya
movies.description: Two souls arrive in a small town, one on vacation, the other to meet a lover. They spend the most magical dream-like days of their lives in that town... with each other.

movies.title: Special 26
movies.description: A gang of con-men rob prominent rich businessmen and politicians by posing as C.B.I and income tax officers.

movies.title: Waqt: The Race Against Time
movies.description: Ishwar Chandra Thakur is living the good life, content with his loving wife Sumitra and son Adiya. There is but one thing which gradually comes to annoy Ishwar: his son's laziness and dependency on his father.

movies.title: Agent Vinod
movies.description: A series of seemingly unconnected events across the world leads to Agent Vinod undertaking a globe-trotting mission to discover why his colleague was murdered.

movies.title: Action Replayy
movies.description: A young man tries to revive his parents' wilting marriage by traveling to the 1970s when their romance was budding and make it bloom: something more complex than he expects.

movies.title: Deewane Huye Paagal
movies.description: A man embarks on journey to find his love in Dubai, only to learn she has different suitors and admirers.

movies.title: Phir Hera Pheri
movies.description: A twist of fate changes the lives of Raju, Shyam and Baburao when they get cheated by a fraudster. They must now find a way to repay a loan taken from a dreaded gangster.

movies.title: Ghulam
movies.description: An amateur boxer runs errands for a local gangster but revolts against him after the gangster kills his friend and his conscience is awakened.

movies.title: Woh Kaun Thi?
movies.description: One stormy night, a doctor offers a ride to a ghostly woman he meets on the side of the road. Later, he discovers his intended bride is identical in appearance to the ghost. Who was she and why does she haunt him?

movies.title: Devdas
movies.description: After his wealthy family prohibits him from marrying the woman he is in love with, Devdas Mukherjee's life spirals further and further out of control as he takes up alcohol and a life of vice to numb the pain.

movies.title: Tridev
movies.description: When an exiled police officer, a bandit and the son of a police commissioner are framed by a smuggler, they join forces to teach him a lesson and prove their innocence.

movies.title: Saugandh
movies.description: A woman whose entire family was murdered by a cruel landowner, vows that she will get her son and his daughter married someday.

movies.title: Anokha Andaaz
movies.description: N/A

movies.title: Hum Se Na Takrana
movies.description: Young, orphaned and homeless Amar rescues young Vijay, and gets adopted by his single mother, Ganga. Both children grow up in Sharifpur, a town that is oppressed by Thakur and his goons, with Amar making a lot of sacrifices so tha...

movies.title: Amar Akbar Anthony
movies.description: Three brothers are separated and united after many years - one is brought up a Hindu, another a Muslim and the last (and most memorable) a Christian. Hilarity and adventure ensues.

movies.title: Gadar: Ek Prem Katha
movies.description: During the Partition of India in 1947, a Sikh truck driver falls in love with a Muslim girl belonging to an aristocratic family.

movies.title: Purani Haveli
movies.description: A rich family eagerly buys an abandoned mansion in a rural area, but later discover that the mansion has a very disturbing and horrifying past.

movies.title: Nagin
movies.description: While Hunting a group kills a Male Shape Shifting Snake so his lover Snake takes female form to kill each hunter one by one. One of the hunter recognizes this plot he sets out to stop Shape shifting Nagin.

movies.title: Koi... Mil Gaya
movies.description: A developmentally disabled young man tries to continue the work his father did in communicating with extra-terrestrials from outer space, which leads to something miraculous and wonderful.

movies.title: Duniya
movies.description: Framed for a crime he didn't commit, Mohan Kumar loses his wife, son, and freedom, then he emerges from prison vowing revenge.

movies.title: Roja
movies.description: A woman from a village in Tamil Nadu marries a sophisticated city dweller and moves with him to Kashmir, where all is rosy - until he gets kidnapped by militants.

movies.title: Khushboo
movies.description: Kusum and Brindavan are two small children living in a small village in India. Both love each other, and decide to marry when they grow up. Kusum has his name tattooed on her arm. But fate has other plans - both are separated. Kus...

movies.title: Swades
movies.description: A successful Indian scientist returns to an Indian village to take his nanny to America with him and in the process rediscovers his roots.

movies.title: Bang Bang
movies.description: A young bank receptionist gets mixed up with Rajveer Nanda, a man who has a mysterious background.

movies.title: Murder
movies.description: Unhappy with her marriage with workaholic man, a woman finds solace in her lover and starts a steamy affair. But this fills her with guilt and leaves him, but he is determined to get her - at any cost.

movies.title: Murder 2
movies.description: An ex-cop is hired by a pimp to find missing call girls and the man responsible behind their abduction.

movies.title: Murder 3
movies.description: After a breakup, Vikram dates Nisha, who moves into his mansion. Nisha notices strange activities, suspects haunting. Vikram's ex Roshini goes missing. Nisha and Vikram's life unravels as he's blamed.

movies.title: Anubhav
movies.description: Meeta Sen (Tanuja) and Amar Sen (Sanjeev Kumar) have been married for several years. Due to Amar's hectic work schedule, the couple have not had children, as there was no time for intimacy. Meeta decides to take matters into her o...

movies.title: Anurodh
movies.description: A rich businessman disapproves of his son's passion for singing. This leads to friction between them, causing the boy to leave home. He adopts a new identity when he becomes a popular singer.

movies.title: Charandas
movies.description: The entire plot is woven around Indian family values, enterprise and meteoric rise in business.

movies.title: Asli-Naqli
movies.description: Renu lives a poor lifestyle with her mom, dad and a brother. Her dad decides to travel to Africa so that he can earn enough money to send his son to study engineering, so that he can find employment abroad. But fate has other plan...
